title: Lynch
desc:
Post 319
- The previous player is put on trial. Red and green cards can be played at all times until your next turn.
- Red cards are guilty. Green cards are pardons. Draws/other colors are abstains. The player on trial can vote.
- The vote ends when it's your turn again. If the majority is guilty, the player draws 5 cards. If they were pardoned, they discard 2 and all players who voted pardon discard 1. If the vote is a tie, nothing happens.
